text:
I have a repeater with required subfields. I am getting errors when the default count of the repeater is `0`.
Something even stranger: when I print out the `module.repeater|length` I am getting a value of `4`
For what itâ€™s worth, the minimum count is set to `0` and max to `2`

Had a simular issue with my if statements around the repeater `{% if modules.repearter|length >= 1 %}` then it would still show even with nothing contained. But if i added and then removed in the UI the content hid
i think default content doesnt always show the way it should.
